message: MAJOR EARTHQUAKE: Magnitude 7.2 struck San Francisco Bay Area at 2:27 PM local time. Epicenter 8km southwest of downtown SF. Depth 12km. Strong shaking felt across Northern California. Tsunami warning issued for coastal areas. Multiple structure collapses reported.

location.name: Off the coast of Fukushima, Japan

message: Strong earthquake M6.8 detected off Fukushima coast. Shindo scale intensity 5 upper observed in coastal areas. Tsunami advisory issued - waves up to 1 meter expected. Nuclear facilities on high alert. Evacuations underway in low-lying coastal zones.

Catastrophic earthquake M7.5 strikes southern Turkey near Gaziantep. Widespread destruction reported across multiple cities. Thousands of buildings collapsed. Mass casualties expected. International rescue teams mobilizing. Winter conditions complicating rescue efforts.

Moderate earthquake M5.6 felt strongly in Wellington and surrounding regions. Epicenter in Cook Strait. Light shaking across lower North Island. Some minor damage to older buildings. No tsunami threat. Residents advised to check homes for damage.

Major earthquake M7.0 strikes Oaxaca region. Strong shaking felt in Mexico City 400km away. Multiple aftershocks ongoing. Coastal areas on tsunami watch. Power outages affecting 500k people. Emergency services overwhelmed. International assistance requested.

Moderate earthquake M5.8 hits West Java near Bandung. Shallow depth causing strong local shaking. Several buildings damaged. Landslides reported in mountainous areas. Hospitals treating injured. No tsunami threat.
